overview_of_class: In this course, we will review major films of Tarkovsky and of Russian and non-Russian directors whose work is related to his (Eisenstein, Wenders, Bergman, Kurosawa).
name: Andrei Tarkovsky's Aesthetics and World Cinema
title: WCAS SLAVIC 368-0-1 Andrei Tarkovsky's Aesthetics and World Cinema
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration is reserved for Slavic Majors or Minors only.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: In this course, we will review major films of Tarkovsky and of Russian and non-Russian directors whose work is related to his (Eisenstein, Wenders, Bergman, Kurosawa).

subject: SLAVIC
